name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Rooster
text: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Fire Fist" monster: You can add 1 "Fire Fist" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Rooster" once per turn. Once per turn: You can send 1 face-up "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap you control to the GY; Set 1 "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck.
